home.subtitle: Wiiの新しいオンラインサービス。
home.beta: This site is in BETA, rate it!
home.info:
<0><1>Wii<2>リンク resurrects many different channels.
現在サポートしているのは以下の通りだ：
home.faqres1: Wiiリンク is the only  to bring back Japanese exclusive Wii channels after they were officially shut down. We've made Wii no Ma, the Demae Channel, and Digicam Print Channel functional once more. With our , you can experience all of these once more on your Nintendo Wii - possibly for the first time.
home.faqres2: Without a replacement service for these channels, they would be lost to time, never to be seen again. However, thanks to our work, future generations of players can experience these channels again!
home.faqres3: Absolutely. We develop all of our channels without copyrighted code and material, and rely solely on what is provided within the channel and public knowledge. All code is written from the ground up. You will have no legal trouble from using our service.
home.faq4: 出前チャンネルは本物の料理を注文できるのか？
home.morefaq: Any other questions? If so, be sure to read our full FAQ!
home.team: プロジェクトを支える人々
home.teamdef: WiiLinkに命を吹き込む素晴らしい人たちの一部！
home.newsdef: Catch up on the latest news of the service!

blog.rss: Bring Wii News anywhere with our RSS Feed!

donate.title: グルーヴを維持し続ける！
donate.desc: Discordサーバーに参加して、コミュニティとチャットしましょう！
donate.donors: プロジェクトのサポーターに大感謝だ！

footer.desc: Wiiリンク is an unofficial, non-profit homebrew project. It is not affiliated with Nintendo and all trademarks are the property of their respective owners. No copyright infringement intended.

services.itn1desc: Re-enter the Wii Room, Nintendo's closed Japanese video-on-demand and shopping service.
services.itn2name: デジカメプリントチャンネル
services.itn2desc: Create albums and business cards with photos from your SD card or with your Mii characters.
services.itn3desc: Watch episodes of the Kirby: Right Back at Ya! anime on this channel previously only available in Europe.
services.itn4desc: Order various types of food directly to your home via your Wii, and pay on delivery.
services.itn5desc: Find current and upcoming weather from your local region or around the globe.
services.itn6name: ニンテンドーチャンネル
services.itn6desc: An interactive guide to games for Wii, Nintendo DS and Nintendo 3DS, with trailers, demos and more.
services.itn7name: テレビの友チャンネル
services.itn7desc: Check your local TV programming guide, find shows that interest you and control your TV with your Wii Remote.

status.coredesc: WiiLinkの中核となるサービスで、当初は日本国内でのみ利用可能だった。
status.video: ビデオ・ストリーミング・サービス
status.videodesc: ビデオを最大限に楽しむための無数のサービス。
